welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ansonia, where small-town charm meets big-city excitement! Known for our beautiful parks, historic architecture, and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Waterbury-Oxford Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Waterbury-Oxford Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by major airlines such as Delta and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights operated by airlines such as British Airways and Air France.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private jet owners and offers luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
